title: Bug 102623: Image cannot be refreshed after importing again
description: When importing a new image into the layout, the new image is not being displayed. Instead, the original image remains visible.
OB: The original image is displayed even after importing a new image and refreshing the layout.
EB: After importing a new image 'image1.jpg' into the layout, the new image should be displayed.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Import an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view. 2. Delete the 'image1.jpg' file from the outline image. 3. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'.
